About.title: About me
About.bio: Hi, I’m Adrián Bolonio, a Senior Software Engineer with a passion on making technology accessible for everyone. I like using and designing systems and interfaces that remove barriers and create a seamless online experience for all users. I bring years of expertise in frontend engineering and accessibility, plus hands-on experience as engineering manager guiding teams toward more inclusive digital solutions. Remote work has allowed me to connect with teams from all over, which keeps me inspired and open to new perspectives. Outside of work, I’m an avid gamer, love experimenting in the kitchen, and always look forward to my next travel adventure.
About.contact_me: The best way to contact me is either via my <twitter>twitter</twitter> or you can send me an <email>email</email>.

Talks.title: Talks
Talks.speaker_invitation: If you’d like to invite me to speak at your conference, feel free to send me an <email>email</email>, but please include the dates and location of the conference, the type of conference (topic of the conference, target audience, number of attendees, number of tracks, ...), the type of the talk (keynote, workshop, panel, lightning talk), and the accessibility details of the venue. Please be aware that I expect you to cover at least the transport and acommodation costs. Thanks.
